name: Keep Me Up
description:
All balls of 1990-2014
Who is the first person that kicks up the ball of 2014 ?

Historic game:
Kick the ball once in a way that it touches the target and then goes into the basket and then keep kicking it up.
Kick the ball twice in a way that it touches two opposite targets and then keep kicking it up.
Who can do more moves in order to gain more coins and collect the all balls?

In the beginning, you, our lovely player, play with your daddy's ball, until you get the new ball, so you have to train very hard to learn patiently how to control the ball easily and astutely. No, really you should always be calm and patient! Now, you are able to move the ball fantastically, and happy to get the 1990 ball. Now we have a lovely player who is calm and patient. Follow the 1994, 1998, 2002, 2006 and 2010. At the end, you get the 2014 ball? Just be calm and patient. Yes, you can. It’s easy for you now.

If you have any suggestion on how we could further improve the design, please leave us a message at info@sinatism.com . We always appreciate comments on how to make our apps even better!
“Sinatism”, says your trusted educational app developer.

Compatible with iPhone, iPod touch and iPad. Also, this app is optimized for iPhone, iPod touch and iPad.
